betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§7§oHarvesting pixons with a bowl and using infusion stones at the infusion tables allows you to produce better enchantments. There are better ways.

§fThis type of magic is not exclusive to me, and many other creatures here have it.
Some, but not all. This means that, again, there must be a rule for having access to this magic.
In the meantime, I will bowl some sparks and harvest their energy! Maybe something will come out of it!
